statements: SELECT * FROM double_billing WHERE patient_id = 12345;
SELECT claim_id, service_code, amount FROM double_billing WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT service_code, amount FROM double_billing WHERE service_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM double_billing ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id FROM double_billing;
SELECT * FROM double_billing WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY service_date DESC
SELECT claim_id, service_code FROM double_billing WHERE patient_id = 1010 AND amount < 5000
SELECT patient_id, service_date FROM double_billing WHERE service_code IN ('ABC', 'DEF', 'GHI')
SELECT * FROM double_billing WHERE service_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY amount ASC
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM double_billing WHERE patient_id = 2020
SELECT * FROM Claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, patient_id, amount FROM Claims WHERE patient_id = 101;
SELECT claim_id, procedure_code, amount FROM Claims WHERE amount > 5000;
SELECT claim_date, patient_id, procedure_code FROM Claims ORDER BY patient_id ASC, claim_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM BillingRecords WHERE billed_by LIKE '%Healthcare%';
SELECT * FROM Claims WHERE claim_id = 100
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, amount FROM Claims WHERE patient_id = 500 ORDER BY claim_date DESC
SELECT claim_id, patient_id, procedure_code, amount FROM Claims WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT record_id, claim_id, total_amount, billed_by FROM BillingRecords WHERE total_amount < 500 ORDER BY total_amount ASC
SELECT c.claim_id, c.amount, br.total_amount FROM Claims c INNER JOIN BillingRecords br ON c.claim_id = br.claim_id
SELECT * FROM claims;
SELECT claim_id, amount FROM claims WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT claim_date FROM claims WHERE claim_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM claims ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date FROM claims WHERE amount < 5000 ORDER BY claim_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM claims WHERE claim_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT claim_id, amount FROM claims WHERE amount >= 1000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM claims WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 2000 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, amount FROM claims WHERE amount < 500 OR amount > 3000 ORDER BY amount DESC, claim_date ASC;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM claims WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM claims;
SELECT claim_id, date_submitted, amount, patient_id FROM claims WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT provider_name, specialty, provider_id FROM providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT billing_id, claim_id, billed_amount FROM billing WHERE billed_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT claim_id1, claim_id2, reason FROM duplicates WHERE reason LIKE '%duplicate%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM claims WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date_submitted DESC;
SELECT billing_id, billed_amount FROM billing WHERE date_billed BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY date_billed ASC;
SELECT provider_name, specialty FROM providers WHERE provider_name LIKE 'D%' ORDER BY provider_name;
SELECT * FROM duplicates WHERE reason IS NOT NULL ORDER BY claim_id1, claim_id2;
SELECT DISTINCT date_billed FROM billing WHERE billed_amount < 5000 ORDER BY date_billed DESC;
SELECT * FROM Claims;
SELECT provider_name, provider_id FROM Providers;
SELECT amount, status FROM Invoices WHERE status='paid';
SELECT payment_date, amount FROM Payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, date_of_service, description FROM Claims WHERE patient_id=123;
SELECT * FROM Claims WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT c.claim_id, i.amount, p.provider_name FROM Claims c JOIN Invoices i ON c.claim_id = i.claim_id JOIN Providers p ON i.provider_id = p.provider_id;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM Invoices;
SELECT c.date_of_service, p.provider_name FROM Claims c, Providers p WHERE c.patient_id = 456 AND p.provider_id = 789;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS avg_amount, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM Invoices WHERE provider_id = 999;
